ignores.title: Ignore rules
ignores.description: List of ignore rules, which will be OR'd together.

ruleIds.title: Issue identifiers
ruleIds.description: List of issue identifiers (SARIF "ruleId"s) to ignore. If not set, all issues are ignored.

pathPatterns.title: Path patterns
pathPatterns.description: List of glob patterns for file paths to ignore. If not set, the ignore applies to all files in the repository.

reason.title: Reason
reason.description: Optionally document why you've suppressed this class of issues.
